meanings.definition: A person who wears a mask.
meanings.sent1: During Halloween, many maskers dressed up in spooky costumes.
meanings.sent2: The maskers at the masquerade ball looked mysterious and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The maskers at the party were so well disguised that no one could recognize them.
meanings.sent4: The maskers in the theater transformed into different characters with their masks.
meanings.sent5: The maskers in the parade added a touch of magic and wonder to the event.

meanings.definition: Devices or substances used to mask or cover odors.
meanings.sent1: The scented maskers in the trash can helped reduce the bad smell.
meanings.sent2: Some maskers are designed to eliminate the unpleasant odor of chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The floral maskers in the room made it smell like a garden.
meanings.sent4: The maskers in the air freshener disguised the smell of the dirty socks.
meanings.sent5: The maskers in the perfume masked the scent of the smoke.

meanings.definition: A group of people who wear masks for a specific purpose, such as a performance or protest.
meanings.sent1: The maskers in the carnival parade danced joyfully in their colorful masks.
meanings.sent2: The maskers in the theater troupe amazed the audience with their skilled performances.
meanings.sent3: The maskers in the flash mob surprised everyone with their synchronized dance.
meanings.sent4: The maskers in the protest march stood united behind their cause.
meanings.sent5: The maskers in the street performance captivated the crowd with their creativity.
